scripts.prepare: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n "ts,py,pr" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgYellow.bold" "npm run prepare:frontend" "npm run prepare:backend" "npm run prepare:proto"
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others -n "FE,BE,+F,+B" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgBlue,bgMagenta" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend:test" "npm run dev:backend:pytest"
scripts.test: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -m 1 -n "ts,py,pr" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgYellow.bold" "npm run test:frontend" "npm run test:backend" "npm run test:proto"
scripts.background: cd backend && python -m uv run background.py
scripts.editor: npm run main:build && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n "FE,BE" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run main:web" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.start: cd backend && python -m uv run service.py
